data.title: Hungarian Association for Migrants
data.description: What to expect for people fleeing Ukraine for Hungary can expect based on current regulations

data.title: Hungarian Trasporation Assistance
data.description: Facebook group about transportation and accommodation sharing in Budapest, and from the borders to Budapest

data.title: Information to Seek Refuge in Poland
data.description: Polish government website page dedicated for Ukrainian citizens seeking refuge. It has a list of checkpoints and information in Ukrainian language.

data.title: Evacuation from Ukraine
data.description: An article providing information on how to evacuate from Ukraine

data.title: Cities to Seek Help Once in Poland
data.description: A list of cities to seek refuge to once evacuated from Ukraine
data.summary: Visit these cities once you have evacuated to Poland: Dorohusk, Dołhobyczów, Zosin, Hrebenne, Korczowa, Medyka, Budomierz, Krościenko

data.title: Legal Stay in Poland
data.description: How to legally stay in Poland after evacuating from Ukraine
data.summary: Citizens of Ukraine who left their homeland as a result of Russian aggression may legally stay for 18 months

data.title: Legal Aid for Refugees in Poland
data.description: Halina Nieć Legal Aid Center is providing legal aid to the following groups: asylum seekers / refugees, stateless persons, victims of human trafficking.
